str2: Wherefore, on which account, therefore. From dia and hos; through which thing, i.e. Consequently.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To make known, declare, know, discover. From a derivative of ginosko; to make known; subjectively, to know.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
No one, none, nothing.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Wind, breath, spirit.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.
A votive offering, a thing devoted to God; a curse, the thing cursed. From anatithemai; a ban or excommunicated.
And, even, also, namely.
No one, none, nothing.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can. Of uncertain affinity; to be able or possible.
Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
Wind, breath, spirit.
